body_html: @tgenin, thanks for pointing it out. I modified the count metric to be more similar to tf.metrics.mean, and this added one to_float() conversion as you suggested. I am not sure how long it will take to check in the change and propagate to GitHub.

body: @tgenin, thanks for pointing it out. I modified the count metric to be more similar to tf.metrics.mean, and this added one to_float() conversion as you suggested. I am not sure how long it will take to check in the change and propagate to GitHub.
